name: WebGL2RenderingContext.drawRangeElements
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.drawRangeElements() method of the WebGL API renders primitives from array data in a given range.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'drawRangeElements' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
